question: Who among the following handed over the Shaheed and Swaraj island to the Azad Hind Government?
explanation: In the year 1943 (6th November) the Shaheed and Swaraj island was handed over to the Azad Hind Government by the then Prime Minister of Japan, Hideki Tojo. The name of the islands was given by Subhas Chandra Bose on 31st December 1943.
